version_description:
-New Levels
-New Characters
-New Fighting Moves
-Earn Oranges to Unlock New Characters

-New Levels
-New Characters
-New Fighting Moves
-Earn Oranges to Unlock New Characters
-Bug fixes and improvements
-Bug fixes and improvements

-New Levels
-New Characters
-You can now upgrade your Health, Punch Power, Kick Power and Weapon Technique
-New Combos
-New Enemies
-New Bosses
-New Weapons
-Control buttons are bigger now
-Completing a level gives extra oranges
-Gameplay Improvements
-Special Offers

-New Levels

-New Combos
-New Enemies
-New Bosses
-New Weapons
-Control buttons are bigger now
-Completing a level gives extra oranges

-Special Offers

-Added new levels
-You can now revive once if you die
-You can now double your collected oranges
-Reduced Size

-Added new levels
-You can now revive once if you die
-You can now double your collected oranges
-Reduced Size

New Levels
New Characters
New Animations
New Combos
New Grab Combos
New Power Booster (Gives 2x Power)
New Musics
New Sounds
New Effects

You can now use two weapons at the same time.
You can now throw weapons after they are broken.
You can now lift crates and throw to enemy.
Beware of the "Raining Crates" 
Improved Ai
Improved Gameplay
Bug fixes
